title: Future online and on-site Art Events re-imagined, demandable.
text: futureMade - art events are currently on development as our first cooperation enabler app to create incentives for demand side to try out new things.
text2: In the scope of our experimental projects, they are visioned to enable the artists to observe the demand publicly and use the time ahead given by audiences on their future plans. That was not enough for us, to give the audiences co-imagine. That's why we are developing transforming as-is business models in a more cooperative-competitive ways, by thinking & acting locally & globally, in a grasroots fashion.
